name: Hand-Painted Floral Scarf
details: A delicate, hand-painted floral scarf crafted with 100% natural silk. Perfect for casual or formal occasions.

name: Bohemian Tie-Dye T-Shirt
details: This t-shirt features a vibrant, bohemian tie-dye pattern, made with breathable cotton for all-day comfort.

name: Embroidered Denim Jacket
details: A classic denim jacket with intricate, hand-embroidered designs that add a unique and stylish touch.

name: Custom Patchwork Hoodie
details: A one-of-a-kind patchwork hoodie made from recycled materials, offering comfort and eco-friendliness.

name: Eco-Printed Maxi Dress
details: An elegant maxi dress with natural eco-print patterns, made from soft and sustainable organic cotton.

name: Batik Print Wrap Skirt
details: A traditional batik-printed wrap skirt, combining vibrant patterns and lightweight, flowing fabric.

name: Handwoven Cotton Tunic
details: This tunic is made with handwoven cotton and designed for both comfort and style in any season.

name: Paint Splatter Sweatpants
details: Sweatpants with a trendy paint-splatter design, crafted from warm and cozy fleece material.

name: Macramé Detail Tank Top
details: A lightweight tank top featuring beautiful macramé details, ideal for summer or layering.
